channel.title: Player command help!
channel.description: currently the ::players command shows the number of players, but i want it to show names too, i know this is possible ive saw it on many servers, and i dont think it would be that hard. anyone have any ideas?

item.title: Player command help!
item.dc:creator: @BrandonxD BrandonxD
item.description:
@BrandonxD wrote:

That’s what im trying to do. im not having very much success, lol.

i tried to fix it, but it isn’t working, i hate this source. >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Player command help!
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

Appearently; this guy is using PI, so that command you posted wont work cause of its Delta.
I dont have any experience with PI but you can try to convert it yourself, its not too hard. I convert codes from tutorials that aint specificly for the base i use. just look at the other commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Player command help!
item.dc:creator: @DeathSlay DeathSlay
item.description:
@DeathSlay wrote:

this si wat i got. and yes this is a very long and not needed coded.
its simple if you cut the code down

(dose not work 100%)

}} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("players")) { sM("There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players!"); sendQuest("DeathSlay - Online Players", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Online players(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + "):", 8145); int line = 8146; for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { client playa = getClient(i); if (!validClient(i)) continue; if (playa.playerName != null) { String title = ""; if (playa.playerRights == 1) { title = "Mod, "; } else if (playa.playerRights == 2) { title = "Admin, "; } title += "level-" + playa.combatLevel; String extra = ""; if (playerRights > 0) { extra = "(" + playa.playerId + ") "; } sendQuest("@dre@" + extra + playa.playerName + "@dbl@ (" + title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", " + playa.absY, line); line++; } } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
